waba.ui
Class Edit

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--waba.ui.Control
        |
        +--waba.ui.Edit
public class Edit
extends Control

Edit is a text entry control.

Here is an example showing an edit control being used: 

 public class MyProgram extends MainWindow
 {
 Edit edit;

 public void onStart()
  {
  edit = new Edit();
  edit.setRect(10, 10, 80, 30);
  add(edit);
  }
